page.title: 05A HAMLET NEAR SUTTON VENY
page.content:
I live in Tytherington,it is a ham- let with a church and three farms.My Dad works on the farm which has about 600 acres.It has six tractors and one combine. The biggest building is the kennels where the dogs were kept for hunting.
Our house is 400 years old.We have not got a shop, a post office or a garage. There is a large green with two big old trees in the middle. We hold barbeques and dances here. The church was built in the 11th century, it has no lighting or heating and is only used once a month. Each year we have a fund raising for the church in which everyone takes part.
